getGCMIntentServiceClassName(android.con.Description: Gets the class name of the intent service that will handle GCM messages.

onReceive(android.content.Context, andro.FullName: public final void onReceive (Context context, Intent intent)

ClassDesc: Please use the @B_android#content#BroadcastReceiver_E@ that receives GCM messages and delivers them to an application-specific @B_com#google#android#gcm#GCMBaseIntentService_E@ subclass. By default, the @B_com#google#android#gcm#GCMBaseIntentService_E@ class belongs to the application main package and is named @B_com#google#android#gcm#GCMConstants#DEFAULT_INTENT_SERVICE_CLASS_NAME_E@. To use a new class, the @B_com#google#android#gcm#GCMBroadcastReceiver#getGCMIntentServiceClassName_E@ must be overridden.
